ComicInfo.Title: The Dog of War Part 5
ComicInfo.Series: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - The Dog of War
ComicInfo.Summary: The Dog of War Part 5: On the Brokers' ship, Sisko risks his own safety to use the Borg device to connect to the Brokers' ship's systems to prevent Starfleet data from being transferred to the Dominion, while at the same time clearing a path for Jadzia and Kira to retrieve Latinum.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-18 02:18:43. [CVDB1005257] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-09 14:47:41. [Issue ID 2559986]
ComicInfo.Characters: unnamed poacher,Morn,Latinum (a dog),Garak,Dr. Julian Bashir,Captain Benjamin Sisko,Constable Odo,Chief Miles O'Brien,Major Kira Nerys,Jake Sisko,Ensign Nog,Lt. Commander Worf,Quark,Lt. Commander Jadzia Dax,the Brokers
ComicInfo.Teams: U. S. S. Defiant Crew,Deep Space Nine Crew,Starfleet
